author: A_Brickset_user
title: Good small set
review:
Well I got this for free yesterday, because I had over 150pts on the annual ticket for Legoland Germany. This set builds nice small creatures like fishes or even insects.
I built all of those models with instructions but in total there are 17 models to build. Well the pieces are thegood old small ones, altough in some newer colors like light blue. The things I don't really like are the eyes, which look a bit weird but all in all it gets a solid 8/10

title: sweet!
review: i like this set it has moveable parts you can make 17 creations you can make a fish a bird a spider and i forgot what else you can make  like all creations i also Moc andi like the yellow and blue parts i like creatore

author: Boidoh
title: Kinda Good
review: It was kinda good. nice pieces... u could build a fish and more. i built the fish and the bird cause all the others looked lame. i had to sneak to the store that was a PAINFUL WALK. and back that was even more of a PAINFUL WALK.. I came back to edit this review because i was younger when i wrote this... and well there not much play uses in this, i mean the fish is bigger than those big rock monsters//
